title: Tom Barrack Explains What Makes President Trump Tick
description: Tom Barrack, President Trump's friend, confidante, and chairman of his inaugural committee, joins Chuck Todd to talk about what the new president is like behind the scenes.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
